}}'''Hydro Treasure Compass''' is a [[Treasure Compass|treasure compass]] [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[chests]] in Fontaine. It can be created through [[forging]] after using the [[Diagram: Dendro Treasure Compass|diagram]] obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 9 in Fontaine.
